------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

EN:

This extension allows you to quickly extract the parameters needed to run the hamster game.

All you need to use it is:

1. Install this extension
2. open the page https://web.telegram.org/k/#@hamster_kombat_bot in the browser on your computer
2. Press the ‚ÄúPlay‚Äù or ‚ÄúPlay in 1 click üêπ‚Äù button
   - At this point, the required data will be automatically copied to your computer's clipboard
3. For ease of use - forward this text to your ‚ÄúFavorites‚Äù (or wherever you want)
   - The final place where you will need this text is the Hamsker mobile app, which can be downloaded from the link in Telegram Bot - https://t.me/hamsker.
4. Paste this text into the text box you'll see when you open the Hamsker mobile app

Voila! You're good! And now your pet can collect coins on its own, and your fingers can finally rest!
